pr_title: TSK-998: Removing linting errors with minor code changes

timeline.bodyText: I changed the name because the input parameter of a method must not be changed.
timeline.author: BVier

timeline.bodyText: I must not change this since I adapted the eslint-rules - but I like this solution better.
timeline.author: BVier

timeline.bodyText:
I'm not sure about this, but the linter said, it's already defined in node_modules and it cannot be overwritten.
And I could delete it without getting in troubles - so I removed it.
timeline.author: BVier

timeline.message:
TSK-998: Removing linting errors with minor code changes

Mainly renaming and restructuring to forEach-loops.
